chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 Pro has the above problem:
nThe screen shows a damage across the display.

Thank you for your help,

Hallo,

der Verkäufer kann die Rücksendung aufgrund des folgenden Problems noch nicht durchführen: Sonstiges.
Er hat weitere Details in dieser Nachricht hinterlegt: Dear Backcare,

Can I check which device the customer sent back to us?

The IMEI of their device can be found by keying in *#06# into the number pad.

Regards,
RK

Dear ecomobile


The device has been sent to you for an exchange.
Damage is visible on the screen across the display.
Please exchange the device after you have received it.

Thank you for your help and I wish you a pleasant day.

Regards,
Reyhan from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

It seems like the customer initially purchased 2 iPhone 13 Pro 256GB - Graphite phones and he only returned one phone back to us for repair/replacement. Can you kindly ask the customer to check the IMEI of the phone he currently has at home that was not being sent to us so that we can check and eliminate it from the two IMEIs that we have. This is done so that we can proceed smoothly with the repair/replacement for the phone. Thank you for your understanding and patience.

Regards,
CH

Dear ecomobile

Thank you for your feedback.

The device has been sent to you.
I will inform you as soon as I receive feedback from the customer.

Thank you for your help and have a pleasant day.

Regards,
Reyhan from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We are looking forward to your reply. Thank you for your assistance and patience.

Regards,
CH

Hello ecomobile,

You have received the product for 06.06.24 The delay to repair or exchange the product is 3 days for technical issue. Without answer with a valid tracking link before the 12.06.24we will refund the customer.

Thank you for understanding,
Ermelinda from Back Market

Dear Backcare, 

Can I confirm if the customer had dropped the device during use? This infomration determines whether the device is still under warranty. Thank youfor your understanding and coopertion.

Regards,
KW

Dear Backcare,

We have processed the refund.

Regards,
KW
